Description: Diademed head of Zeus Ammon, right; border of dots. (obverse)
Eagle standing on thunderbolt with outspread wings, left. (reverse)
State: Associated with: Kingdom of Egypt Ancient Greece and Rome: Kingdom of Egypt
Bibliographic references: SNG Copenhagen / Sylloge Nummorum Graecorum: The Royal Collection of coins and medals, Danish National Museum (43 vols) (163) (type)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Ptolemy II Philadelphos
